com.intersys.globals.graphapi
Interface GraphNode<forType>

All Superinterfaces:
GraphComponent
All Known Implementing Classes:
GlGraphNode
public interface GraphNode<forType>
extends GraphComponent

Node presents a simple interface for a node in a graph. Note this cannot exist apart from a graph; if it did, it would only be an Object! Consequently its methods include Graphs.

Method Summary
 void Connect(GraphNode toNode)
          Adds an edge from this node to another Node in the graph.
 void Connect(GraphNode toNode, java.lang.Long atWeight)
          Adds an Edge from this node to another Node in the graph.

Connect

void Connect(GraphNode toNode)
Adds an edge from this node to another Node in the graph. This node is "From" or "Source" on the edge.

Parameters:
toNode - the new "To" or "Target" Node for the new Edge

Connect

void Connect(GraphNode toNode,
             java.lang.Long atWeight)
Adds an Edge from this node to another Node in the graph. This node is "From" or "Source" on the edge.

Parameters:
toNode - the new "To" or "Target" Node for the new Edge
atWeight - weight of the new Edge

getValue
